title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example exhibits excessive flashing when the window is resized vertically. This behavior is unexpected and needs to be addressed.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, it is observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The expected behavior is that only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, without any flashing occurring for the tabs or other frames.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Run the Control Example. 2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only. 3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
